channel.title: Xos Trucks News
channel.description: Latest news and press releases from Xos Trucks

item.title: Xos Launches 2026 Electric Class 6 Chassis, Starting at Just $99,000
item.description: Xos launches its 2026 Electric Class 6 Chassis at an accessible starting price of $99,000, making electric commercial vehicles more affordable for fleets.

item.title: Xos Expands Hub Lineup with Three Capacity Options, Making Mobile Charging Accessible to All Fleets
item.description: Xos expands its Hub mobile charging lineup with three new capacity options, broadening access to flexible charging solutions for electric fleets of all sizes.

item.title: Xos Extends Profitability Streak with Strong Q3 2025 Performance and Positive Operating Cash Flow
item.description: Xos reports strong Q3 2025 results, extending its profitability streak with positive operating cash flow and continued business momentum.

item.title: Xos Inc. Announces Third Quarter 2025 Earnings Release Date and Conference Call
item.description: Xos Inc. announces the date and details for its Third Quarter 2025 earnings release and investor conference call.

item.title: HVIP Is Back: Here's What California Fleets Need to Know â€” And Why It Matters Now
item.description: California's HVIP incentive program is back, and Xos breaks down what fleet operators need to know to take advantage of available funding for electric vehicles.

item.title: Windrose and Xos Partner to Deliver Game-Changing Charging Access for Class 8 Electric Fleets
item.description: Windrose and Xos announce a strategic partnership to deliver expanded charging infrastructure access for Class 8 electric fleet operators.

item.title: Xos Inc. Appoints Automotive Veteran John Smith to its Board of Directors
item.description: Xos Inc. strengthens its leadership by appointing automotive industry veteran John Smith to its Board of Directors.

item.title: Xos Breaks the $100K Barrier for High-Powered Mobile Charging with New Hub Approved for $110,000 CORE Incentive
item.description: Xos announces its new Hub has been approved for a $110,000 CORE incentive, breaking the $100K barrier and making high-powered mobile charging more financially accessible.

item.title: Xos Hits New Milestones in Q2 2025 with Highest Revenue and Deliveries in the Company's History
item.description: Xos reports record-breaking Q2 2025 results, achieving the highest revenue and vehicle deliveries in the company's history.

item.title: Xos Inc. Announces Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Release Date and Conference Call
item.description: Xos Inc. announces the date and details for its Second Quarter 2025 earnings release and investor conference call.

item.title: Xos Delivers First Quarter Results Highlighting GAAP Margin Gains
item.description: Xos reports its Q1 2025 financial results, highlighting meaningful GAAP margin gains and continued operational progress.

item.title: Xos Inc. Announces First Quarter 2025 Earnings Release Date and Conference Call
item.description: Xos Inc. announces the date and details for its First Quarter 2025 earnings release and investor conference call.

item.title: Xos Inc. Reports Record-Breaking 2024 with Growing Unit Deliveries and Highest Ever Gross Profit
item.description: Xos reports a record-breaking 2024 fiscal year with growing unit deliveries and the highest gross profit in the company's history.

item.title: Xos Inc. Announces Fourth Quarter 2024 Earnings Release Date and Conference Call
item.description: Xos Inc. announces the date and details for its Fourth Quarter 2024 earnings release and investor conference call.

item.title: Xos Inc. Announces Major Milestone: Xos Hub Listed on Federal GSA Schedule
item.description: Xos announces a significant milestone as the Xos Hub is officially listed on the Federal GSA Schedule, opening doors to government procurement opportunities.

item.title: Xos Inc. Powers Crown Linen Service Inc.'s Energy Initiatives with Battery Electric Stepvans
item.description: Xos partners with Crown Linen Service Inc. to support their energy initiatives by delivering battery electric stepvans for their fleet operations.

item.title: Xos Inc. Delivers Strong Unit Delivery and Promising Gross Profit Performance in Q3 2024
item.description: Xos reports strong Q3 2024 results with solid unit deliveries and promising gross profit performance.

item.title: Xos Inc. Announces Third Quarter 2024 Earnings Release Date and Conference Call
item.description: Xos Inc. announces the date and details for its Third Quarter 2024 earnings release and investor conference call.

item.title: Xos Inc. Unveils 2025 Xos SV Stepvan Offering Greater Flexibility for Fleets
item.description: Xos unveils its 2025 Xos SV Stepvan with enhanced features designed to offer greater flexibility and functionality for commercial fleet operators.

item.title: Xos Inc. Delivers Strong Unit Delivery, Sales Growth and Promising Operating Profit Performance in Q2 2024
item.description: Xos reports strong Q2 2024 results with solid unit deliveries, sales growth, and promising operating profit performance.

item.title: Xos Inc. Reschedules Second Quarter 2024 Earnings Release Date and Conference Call
item.description: Xos Inc. announces the rescheduled date for its Second Quarter 2024 earnings release and investor conference call.

item.title: Xos Inc. Announces Second Quarter 2024 Earnings Release Date and Conference Call
item.description: Xos Inc. announces the date and details for its Second Quarter 2024 earnings release and investor conference call.

item.title: Xos Inc. Delivers First Stepvans and Energy Solutions to Neighbor Morgan Services
item.description: Xos delivers its first stepvans and energy solutions to Neighbor Morgan Services, marking a key customer milestone.

item.title: The 2024 Xos SV Stepvan Now Available for Incentives on the HVIP Vehicle Catalog
item.description: The 2024 Xos SV Stepvan is now listed on the HVIP Vehicle Catalog, making it eligible for California fleet incentives.

item.title: Xos Inc. Announces First Quarter 2024 Earnings Release Date and Conference Call
item.description: Xos Inc. announces the date and details for its First Quarter 2024 earnings release and investor conference call.

item.title: Xos Inc. Unveils Upgraded 2024 Xos SV Stepvan with Enhanced Features for Fleet Operators
item.description: Xos unveils an upgraded 2024 Xos SV Stepvan featuring enhanced capabilities and features designed specifically for commercial fleet operators.

item.title: Xos Inc. Accelerates Growth with Strategic Acquisition of ElectraMeccanica
item.description: Xos announces the strategic acquisition of ElectraMeccanica to accelerate growth and strengthen its position in the commercial electric vehicle market.

item.title: Xos Inc. Announces Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2023 Earnings Release Date and Conference Call
item.description: Xos Inc. announces the date and details for its Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2023 earnings release and investor conference call.

item.title: Xos Inc. Secures Purchase Order from Mission Linen Supply for New 22' Stepvan Option
item.description: Xos secures a purchase order from Mission Linen Supply for its new 22-foot stepvan option, expanding its customer base in the linen services sector.

item.title: The Xos Hub Gets Major Upgrades and a Purchase Order from Xcel Energy
item.description: Xos announces major upgrades to the Xos Hub mobile charger along with a new purchase order from Xcel Energy, validating the product's value for utility fleets.

item.title: Xos Inc. Ranked Number 51 Fastest-Growing Company in North America on the 2023 Deloitte Technology Fast 500
item.description: Xos Inc. is recognized as the 51st fastest-growing company in North America on the prestigious 2023 Deloitte Technology Fast 500 list.

item.title: ElectraMeccanica and Xos Host Joint Investor Call to Provide Shareholder Update
item.description: ElectraMeccanica and Xos host a joint investor call to provide shareholders with an update on their proposed combination and strategic direction.

item.title: Xos and ElectraMeccanica Announce Proposed Combination to Accelerate Xos Leadership Position in Manufacturing Commercial Electric Vehicles
item.description: Xos and ElectraMeccanica announce a proposed business combination aimed at accelerating Xos's leadership in manufacturing commercial electric vehicles for major U.S. fleet customers.
